languages.text: "Потому что я — Лорд-капитан, и это — мое судно, мой когитатор и мое дело!"
"Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"
languages.original_text: "Потому что я — Лорд-капитан, и это — мое судно, мой когитатор и мое дело!"

traits.locale_text: "Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"
"Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"
"Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"
"Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"
"Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"
"Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"

languages.text: « Parce que c'est mon vaisseau, mon cogitateur, et qu'en tant que {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, tout ce qui se passe à bord me concerne directement ! »
languages.original_text: "Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"

traits.locale_text: « Parce que c'est mon vaisseau, mon cogitateur, et qu'en tant que {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, tout ce qui se passe à bord me concerne directement ! »

languages.text: «¡Porque soy {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y esta es mi nave, mi cogitador y mi problema!».
languages.original_text: "Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Porque soy {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y esta es mi nave, mi cogitador y mi problema!».

languages.text: “因为我是领主舰长。这里是我的船，我的沉思者，我说了算！”
languages.original_text: "Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"

traits.locale_text: “因为我是领主舰长。这里是我的船，我的沉思者，我说了算！”

languages.text: 「私がロード・キャプテンだからだ。そしてこれは私の船で、私の考算機、私の問題だ」
languages.original_text: "Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"

traits.locale_text: 「私がロード・キャプテンだからだ。そしてこれは私の船で、私の考算機、私の問題だ」

languages.text: "Weil ich der Lord Captain bin und das mein Schiff ist, mein Cogitator, meine Sache!"
languages.original_text: "Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"

traits.locale_text: "Weil ich der Lord Captain bin und das mein Schiff ist, mein Cogitator, meine Sache!"

languages.text: "Çünkü ben Lord Kaptan'ım. Bu da benim gemim, benim kavramsayarım ve benim meselem!"
languages.original_text: "Because I am the Lord Captain, and this is my ship, my cogitator, and my business!"
